TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ValidationSummary extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 在窗体中显示发生的所有验证错误的摘要。

span.span: Presents a summary of all the validation errors that have occurred on a form.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类创建的所有验证错误的摘要，并呈现为内联或在单独的窗体上。The class creates a summary of all validation errors and presents them either inline or on a separate form. 使用中的文本属性的错误显示为内联或在汇总窗体上。The uses the text in the property for the errors that are displayed either inline or on a summary form. 尽管ASP.NET 移动控件类模仿 Web 窗体的行为在许多方面，移动控件版本的类的类不是直接继承自的类 Web 窗体版本。Although the class of the ASP.NET mobile controls mimics the behavior of the Web Forms class in many ways, the mobile controls version of the class does not inherit directly from the Web Forms version of the class. 因此，修改的摘要，例如验证输出的属性属性，在移动控件中不可用。Thus, properties that modify the output of the validation summary, such as the property, are not available in mobile controls. 直接从派生摘要移动控件版本类。The mobile controls version of the summary is derived directly from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实例类，并将其添加到 ASP.NET 移动 Web 应用程序在页面加载过程中的窗体。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of a class, and add it to a form in an ASP.NET mobile Web application during a page load. 用户定义`Page_Load`事件处理程序确定是否有错误，然后启动窗体包含，或祝贺性感谢你窗体。The user-defined `Page_Load` event handler determines if there is an error, and then either launches the form containing the , or the congratulatory thank you form. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileValidationSummarySample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileValidationSummarySample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileValidationSummarySample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileValidationSummarySample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

span.span: A string from the validation summary that links to the form that contains an error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证过程时窗体的呈现过程中发生错误，使用中的文本属性作为验证摘要页面显示的字符串。When an error occurs during the rendering of a form, the validation process uses the text in the property as the string that is displayed on the validation summary page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定中的链接文本以返回到该表单，并出现错误。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the link text in a to return to the form with the error. [!code-csharp[MobileValidationSummarySample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileValidationSummarySample/cs/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[MobileValidationSummarySample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileValidationSummarySample/vb/Default.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要使用验证，此属性必须包含一个值，表示一个有效的窗体的 id。If you want to use validation, this property must contain a value that represents a valid form ID. 属性可以在代码中或以声明方式，如下所示的示例设置类。The property can be set in code or declaratively, as in the example for the class.

span.span: The text that will appear in the heading section of the validation summary page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你要在 HTML 中，开发呈现页面的值属性第一个。If you are developing in HTML, the page renders the value of the property first. 验证过程验证窗体时, 它会生成一份每个验证程序的属性。When the validation process invalidates a form, it produces a list of properties for each validator. 每个实例中无效的窗体上出现错误的列表结果中的属性。Each instance of an property in the list results in an error on the invalid form. 此错误列表后跟面向无效窗体。This list of errors is followed by a that targets the invalid form. 链接的文本是值属性。The text of the link is the value of the property. WML 1.1 的显示的错误是类似于 HTML，只不过属性显示为纯 WML 文本跟每个错误消息，通过前面有"-"（连字符后跟一个空格）。The display of errors for WML 1.1 is similar to HTML, except that the property is displayed as plain WML text followed by each error message and preceded by "- " (a hyphen followed by a space).
